about_the_game:
This game is a casual game.

Various interactive items: most items in each scene can be interacted with. Players need to find the correct items in the scene to give to the NPC according to the needs of the NPC.

After the NPC's favorability reaches a certain stage, the mini-game will be activated. At this point, the player needs to pass the mini-game to unlock the next level.

In the last level, players can select a photo from our preset character image library to generate a custom avatar to replace the character image of the NPC in this level.


Instructions:
Esc key: main menu;
E key: interact with item;
C Key: Squat down;
W A S D keys: control movement;
In the Kyoto alley scene, the space bar is used to bring up the avatar settings.

content_descriptors.notes:
1, All the characters in the games are over 18 year old.
2, Some poses she made may be sexy.
3, Some flirtatious conversations.

Various interactive items: most items in each scene can be interacted with. Players need to find the correct items in the scene to give to the NPC according to the needs of the NPC.

After the NPC's favorability reaches a certain stage, the mini-game will be activated. At this point, the player needs to pass the mini-game to unlock the next level.

In the last level, players can select a photo from our preset character image library to generate a custom avatar to replace the character image of the NPC in this level.

name: Unlock Kimono Cuties

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD3000 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: This game is a casual game. Various interactive items: most items in each scene can be interacted with. Players need to find the correct items in the scene to give to the NPC according to the needs of the NPC.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
